divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the clouds on my sidewalk when my parents came out and I saw a metallic object in the sky I noticed it out of the corner of my eye because I saw a bright shine on it from the sun and I turned and this is what I saw it was very very low to the ground,it was a sphere with yellowish green lights around the side and a red glowing sphere on the bottom. I thout it was a plane but I knew it was not human. I saw that it was going about 90 mph but slowed down I blinked it was gone I looked around I did not see or hear anything after or during the event I was petrified believe it!!!!!!!!!!!Then I went inside and told my sister and did not think to much about it but I could'nt believe it it distubs me and I am shaking thinking about it while reporting it now
